channel.title: Whonix KVM 14.0.1.3.8 - Point Release - Tester Version
channel.description:
Tester version 14.0.1.3.8 is now available for download.
In reality, it is pretty much stable at this point and the problems with 14.0.1.1.7 ironed out.
This is a release candidate for a [point release](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release).
Debian APT remote code execution vulnerability [DSA 4371-1](https://lists.debian.org/debian-security-announce/2019/msg00010.html) is fixed in this version.
An Apparmor bug that prevented Whonixcheck from starting was fixed.
For a detailed list of changes since 14.0.1.1.7 see the commit [log](https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/14.0.1.1.7-developers-only...14.0.1.3.8-developers-only)
-----
Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for KVM: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix

item.title: Whonix KVM 14.0.1.3.8 - Point Release - Tester Version
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Tester version 14.0.1.3.8 is now available for download.

In reality, it is pretty much stable at this point and the problems with 14.0.1.1.7 ironed out.

This is a release candidate for a point release.

Debian APT remote code execution vulnerability DSA 4371-1 is fixed in this version.

An Apparmor bug that prevented Whonixcheck from starting was fixed.

For a detailed list of changes since 14.0.1.1.7 see the commit log
